definitions.definition: That has deteriorated to the point of no longer being usable or edible .
The state of being heavily pampered .
Having a selfish or greedy character due to pampering .
definitions.label_groups: of a person, usually a child

main_definition: ( of food ) That has deteriorated to the point of no longer being usable or edible .
secondary_definitions: ( of a person ) The state of being heavily pampered .
( of a person, usually a child ) Having a selfish or greedy character due to pampering .
